name: 廖子賢
objective:
本課程旨介紹管理理論與應用。課程內容包含：（1）管理演進；（2）國際管理；（3）管理功能—規劃、組織、領導、控制；（4）未來趨勢與議題。
This course introduces the theories and applications of management. Topics to be covered are (1) management yesterday and today, (2) international management, (3) management functions, i.e. planning, organizing, leading, and controlling, and (4) future trends and issues.
scorePolicy:
1.期中考30%

3.作業與報告30%
4.課堂參與10%
